summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Trade Simulator feature (Phase 1 MVP). All backend APIs and frontend UI components working correctly. Tested: Screener Simulate button, PMCC Simulate button, Simulator dashboard with summary cards, charts, trades table, trade detail dialog, and Update Prices functionality.

issues: Console warnings about chart dimensions (-1 width/height) - cosmetic issue, charts still render correctly
Missing aria-describedby for DialogContent - accessibility warning, not blocking

seed_data_creation: Used existing test user test_manual_trade@example.com. Added SOFI covered call trade to simulator during testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Trade Simulator MVP fully functional. Backend routes: POST /api/simulator/trade, GET /api/simulator/trades, GET /api/simulator/summary, POST /api/simulator/update-prices, DELETE /api/simulator/trades/{id}, DELETE /api/simulator/clear. Frontend: Screener.js and PMCC.js have Simulate buttons with modals, Simulator.js has dashboard with summary cards (Total P/L, Win Rate, Active Trades, Capital Deployed, Avg Return, Assignment Rate), Strategy Distribution pie chart, P/L by Strategy bar chart, trades table with filtering, and trade detail dialog.
